reviewText: Climbing Haleakala.....This is an incredibly tough ride but the DVD does a good job of getting you in the zone.  Good soundtrack and  very cool footage.

Awesome ride for those who spin indoors! I've always wanted to do this ride and now I can virtually. The photography is amazing and riding with real professional cyclist on one of the longest hill climbs on earth virtually is unbelievable. I really pushed myself and felt it all the way!
